description.en: A classic American dessert with spiced apples in a flaky crust.
description.de: Ein klassisches Dessert mit gewürzten Äpfeln in knusprigem Teig.
description.fr: Un dessert classique avec des pommes épicées dans une pâte croustillante.
description.it: Un classico dessert con mele speziate in una pasta friabile.

en: Mix sliced apples with sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice.
Fill crust with apple mixture, dot with butter, cover with top crust.
Bake until golden and bubbly, about 45 to 55 minutes.

description.en: A juicy beef patty served in a bun with classic toppings.
description.de: Ein saftiges Rindfleisch-Patty im Brötchen mit klassischen Toppings.
description.fr: Un steak haché juteux dans un pain avec des garnitures classiques.
description.it: Un succoso hamburger di manzo in un panino con condimenti classici.

en: Form beef into patties and season with salt and pepper.
Sear or grill 3 to 5 minutes per side (depending on thickness).

description.en: Swiss crispy potato cake, perfect with eggs or salad.
description.de: Schweizer Kartoffelrösti, knusprig und goldbraun.
description.fr: Galette de pommes de terre suisse, croustillante et dorée.
description.it: Tortino svizzero di patate, croccante e dorato.

en: Pan-fry in butter/oil, press into a cake.
Cook until crisp, flip, and crisp the other side.

description.en: Creamy sliced veal (or meat) in a Zurich-style sauce, often served with rösti.
description.de: Kalbsgeschnetzeltes in Rahmsauce nach Zürcher Art, oft mit Rösti.
description.fr: Émincé à la crème façon Zurich, souvent servi avec des rösti.
description.it: Carne a striscioline in salsa cremosa stile Zurigo, spesso con rösti.

en: Sauté onion and mushrooms in butter.
Quickly sear meat strips, then remove.
Deglaze with stock, add cream, simmer briefly.
Return meat, warm through, season and serve.

description.en: No-bake layered dessert bar from Canada.
description.de: No-Bake Schichtdessert aus Kanada.
description.fr: Dessert canadien en couches, sans cuisson.
description.it: Dolce canadese a strati, senza cottura.

en: Press crumb base into a pan and chill.
Spread filling layer and chill again.
Top with melted chocolate and set.

description.en: Fries topped with cheese curds and gravy, a Canadian comfort food.
description.de: Pommes mit Käsebruch und Sauce, kanadisches Comfort Food.
description.fr: Frites avec fromage en grains et sauce, un classique canadien.
description.it: Patatine con cagliata di formaggio e salsa, comfort food canadese.

en: Layer fries, add cheese curds, pour hot gravy over and serve.

description.en: Creamy avocado dip with lime and salt, great with tortilla chips.
description.de: Cremiger Avocado-Dip mit Limette und Salz.
description.fr: Dip d’avocat crémeux avec citron vert et sel.
description.it: Crema di avocado con lime e sale.

en: Mix in lime juice and salt.

description.en: Marinated pork tacos with pineapple, a street-food favorite.
description.de: Marinierte Schweinefleisch-Tacos mit Ananas.
description.fr: Tacos de porc mariné avec ananas.
description.it: Tacos di maiale marinato con ananas.

en: Marinate pork and cook (grill or pan).
Assemble with pork, pineapple, onion, and cilantro.

description.en: Brazilian cheese bread, chewy inside and crisp outside.
description.de: Brasilianische Käsebrötchen, innen weich und außen knusprig.
description.fr: Petits pains au fromage brésiliens, moelleux et croustillants.
description.it: Panini al formaggio brasiliani, morbidi e croccanti.

en: Bake at 200°C until puffed and golden.

description.en: Brazilian black bean stew often cooked with pork and sausage.
description.de: Brasilianischer Bohneneintopf, oft mit Schwein und Wurst.
description.fr: Ragoût de haricots noirs brésilien, souvent avec porc et saucisse.
description.it: Stufato brasiliano di fagioli neri, spesso con maiale e salsiccia.

en: Soak beans if needed, then simmer until tender.
Cook meats and aromatics, combine with beans.
Simmer until flavors meld, serve with rice.

description.en: Tender baked scones, commonly served with jam and cream.
description.de: Lockere Scones, oft mit Marmelade und Clotted Cream.
description.fr: Scones moelleux, servis avec confiture et crème.
description.it: Scones soffici, spesso con marmellata e crema.

en: Mix dry ingredients, rub in butter.
Add milk, form dough, cut rounds.
Bake at 200°C until risen and golden.

description.en: Crispy battered fish with thick-cut fries, a UK classic.
description.de: Frittierter Fisch im Backteig mit Pommes, ein UK-Klassiker.
description.fr: Poisson frit en pâte avec frites, un classique britannique.
description.it: Pesce fritto in pastella con patatine, classico del Regno Unito.

en: Cut and fry potatoes until golden.
Coat fish in batter and fry until crisp.

description.en: Provençal vegetable stew with eggplant, zucchini, tomato, and herbs.
description.de: Gemüseragout aus der Provence mit Aubergine, Zucchini und Tomate.
description.fr: Ragoût de légumes provençal avec aubergine, courgette et tomate.
description.it: Stufato di verdure provenzale con melanzane, zucchine e pomodoro.

en: Sauté aromatics, add vegetables in batches.
Simmer until tender, season and serve.

description.en: Chicken braised with wine, mushrooms, and aromatics.
description.de: Huhn in Wein geschmort mit Pilzen und Aromaten.
description.fr: Poulet braisé au vin avec champignons et aromates.
description.it: Pollo brasato al vino con funghi e aromi.

en: Add mushrooms near the end, reduce sauce and serve.

description.en: Soft egg noodles baked with cheese and onions, a comfort classic.
description.de: Spätzle mit Käse und Zwiebeln, ein klassisches Wohlfühlessen.
description.fr: Spätzle avec fromage et oignons, un plat réconfortant.
description.it: Spätzle con formaggio e cipolle, comfort food.

en: Layer with cheese, top with fried onions.
Warm until cheese melts and serve.

description.en: German grilled sausage, often served with cabbage and potatoes.
description.de: Deutsche Bratwurst, oft mit Kraut und Kartoffeln serviert.
description.fr: Saucisse grillée allemande, souvent avec chou et pommes de terre.
description.it: Salsiccia tedesca alla griglia, spesso con cavolo e patate.

en: Pan-sear or grill bratwurst until browned and cooked through.
Serve hot with mustard and sides.

description.en: Chilled Spanish tomato soup blended with vegetables and olive oil.
description.de: Kalte spanische Tomatensuppe mit Gemüse und Olivenöl.
description.fr: Soupe froide de tomates espagnole avec légumes et huile d’olive.
description.it: Zuppa fredda spagnola di pomodoro con verdure e olio d’oliva.

en: Serve cold with toppings if desired.

description.en: Spanish rice dish often cooked with seafood or meat and saffron.
description.de: Spanisches Reisgericht, oft mit Meeresfrüchten oder Fleisch und Safran.
description.fr: Plat de riz espagnol souvent avec fruits de mer ou viande et safran.
description.it: Piatto di riso spagnolo spesso con frutti di mare o carne e zafferano.

en: Add rice, then stock and simmer without stirring much.
Add seafood/meat and cook until done; rest before serving.

description.en: Classic pizza with tomato, mozzarella, and basil.
description.de: Klassische Pizza mit Tomate, Mozzarella und Basilikum.
description.fr: Pizza classique avec tomate, mozzarella et basilic.
description.it: Pizza classica con pomodoro, mozzarella e basilico.

en: Stretch dough, add sauce and mozzarella.
Bake hot (as hot as your oven goes) until browned.
Top with basil and a drizzle of olive oil.

description.en: Creamy pasta made with eggs, cheese, and cured pork.
description.de: Cremige Pasta mit Ei, Käse und gepökeltem Schweinefleisch.
description.fr: Pâtes crémeuses avec œufs, fromage et porc salé.
description.it: Pasta cremosa con uova, formaggio e guanciale/pancetta.

en: Combine hot pasta with pork, remove from heat, add egg mixture and toss quickly.

description.en: Indian lentil curry tempered with spices, comforting and protein-rich.
description.de: Indisches Linsencurry mit Gewürzen, sättigend und eiweißreich.
description.fr: Curry de lentilles indien aux épices, nourrissant et riche en protéines.
description.it: Curry di lenticchie indiano con spezie, nutriente e proteico.

en: Sauté onion, garlic, spices, add tomato.
Combine with lentils, simmer, and finish with a spiced tadka if desired.

description.en: Creamy tomato-based chicken curry, popular in North Indian cuisine.
description.de: Cremiges Hähnchen-Curry in Tomaten-Sahne-Sauce.
description.fr: Curry de poulet crémeux à base de tomate.
description.it: Curry di pollo cremoso al pomodoro.

en: Simmer tomato sauce with spices and butter.
Add cream, return chicken, simmer briefly and serve.

description.en: Quick stir-fried rice with vegetables, great for leftovers.
description.de: Schneller gebratener Reis mit Gemüse, perfekt für Reste.
description.fr: Riz sauté rapide aux légumes, idéal pour les restes.
description.it: Riso saltato veloce con verdure, perfetto per gli avanzi.

en: Heat oil, sauté garlic and vegetables.
Season with soy sauce and serve.

description.en: Spicy stir-fry with chicken, chilies, and peanuts or cashews.
description.de: Scharfes Pfannengericht mit Huhn, Chili und Nüssen.
description.fr: Sauté épicé au poulet, piments et cacahuètes/noix.
description.it: Saltato piccante con pollo, peperoncini e arachidi/anacardi.

en: Add aromatics, chilies, sauce, and nuts.
Toss quickly and serve with rice.

description.en: Simple maki rolls with rice, nori, and vegetable fillings.
description.de: Einfache Maki-Rollen mit Reis, Nori und Gemüse.
description.fr: Maki simples avec riz, algue nori et légumes.
description.it: Maki semplici con riso, nori e verdure.

en: Place nori on a mat, spread rice, add vegetables.

description.en: Japanese noodle soup often served with pork or chicken and a rich broth.
description.de: Japanische Nudelsuppe, oft mit Schwein/Huhn und kräftiger Brühe.
description.fr: Soupe de nouilles japonaise avec bouillon riche, souvent porc/poulet.
description.it: Zuppa di noodles giapponese con brodo ricco, spesso con carne.

en: Assemble bowl with noodles, broth, and toppings.

description.en: Café-style toast topped with mashed avocado and seasoning.
description.de: Café-Toast mit zerdrückter Avocado und Gewürzen.
description.fr: Toast façon café garni d’avocat écrasé et assaisonné.
description.it: Toast in stile café con avocado schiacciato e condimento.

en: Mash avocado with salt, pepper, and optional lemon.
Spread on toast and finish with toppings.

description.en: Savory baked pie filled with meat and gravy, a popular Aussie snack.
description.de: Herzhafte Pastete mit Fleisch und Sauce, beliebter Snack in Australien.
description.fr: Tourte salée garnie de viande et sauce, snack populaire en Australie.
description.it: Torta salata ripiena di carne e salsa, snack popolare in Australia.

en: Line tin with pastry, fill, top with pastry lid.
